alert.note: Alert for Aguada; Aguadilla; Moca (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 18 at 10:47PM ADT until September 19 at 9:00AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Aguada County in Puerto Rico... Aguadilla County in Puerto Rico... Moca County in Puerto Rico... * Until 800 AM AST Monday. * At 947 PM AST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain falling across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 0.5 inches in 1 hour. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of the Culebrinas is occurring. Rio Culebrinas near Moca has exceeded 25.93 feet. Downstream flooding is certain. Culebrinas is out of its banks - Road 110 km 10.1 (interior) is flooded/impassable FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...0.5 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
